info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 1:33PM CDT until August 03 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR WILL AND SOUTHEASTERN COOK COUNTIES... At 133 PM CDT, multiple severe thunderstorms were located over Tinley Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Joliet, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Calumet City, Chicago Heights, Roseland, Lansing, Oak Forest, Harvey, Lockport, New Lenox, Homer Glen, Blue Island, Dolton, Park Forest, Homewood, Alsip, Matteson, Mokena and Frankfort. This includes... University of St. Francis, Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, Chicagoland Speedway...Route 66 Raceway, Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre, Governors State University, Joliet Slammers Baseball, Prairie State College, South Suburban College, and Will County Fairgrounds. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
